briefdescription.para: Pair of source ID and transform string for indexing.

memberdef.type: std::unordered_map< std::string, const PartitionField *, StringHash, StringEqual >
memberdef.name: name_to_field_

briefdescription.para: Set whether column resolution in the source schema should be case sensitive.
Add a new partition field from a source column.

detaileddescription.para: The partition field will use identity transform on the source column, and use source column name as the partition field name.

parameterdescription.para: Source column name in the table schema.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Add a new partition field with a custom name.

parameterdescription.para: The term representing the source column, should be unbound.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Remove a partition field by name.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the partition field to remove.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Remove a partition field by its source term.

detaileddescription.para: The partition field with the same transform and source reference will be removed. If the term is a reference and does not have a transform, identity transform is used.

parameterdescription.para: The term representing the source column, should be unbound.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Rename a field in the partition spec.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the partition field to rename.
Replacement name for the partition field.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Sets that the new partition spec will NOT be set as the default.

detaileddescription.para: The default behavior is to set the new spec as the default partition spec.

simplesect.para: Reference to this for method chaining.

briefdescription.para: Return the kind of this pending update.
Assign a new partition field ID.

memberdef.argsstring: (int32_t source_id, std::shared_ptr< Transform > transform, std::string_view name)
memberdef.name: RecycleOrCreatePartitionField

briefdescription.para: Recycle or create a partition field.

detaileddescription.para: In V2 it searches for a similar partition field in historical partition specs. Tries to match on source field ID, transform type and target name (optional). If not found or in V1 cases it creates a new PartitionField.

parameterdescription.para: The target partition field name, if specified.

simplesect.para: The recycled or newly created partition field.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string_view name, int32_t source_id, const std::shared_ptr< Transform > &transform)
memberdef.name: AddFieldInternal

briefdescription.para: Internal implementation of AddField with resolved source ID and transform.
Generate a partition field name from the source and transform.
Check for redundant time-based partition fields.
Handle rewriting a delete-and-add operation for the same field.
Internal helper to remove a field by transform key.
Build index of historical partition fields for efficient recycling (V2+).
Check if a transform is a time-based transform.
Check if a partition field uses void transform.

memberdef.type: std::unordered_map< std::string, const PartitionField *, StringHash, StringEqual >
memberdef.definition: std::unordered_map< std::string, const PartitionField *, StringHash, StringEqual > iceberg::UpdatePartitionSpec::IndexSpecByName
memberdef.name: IndexSpecByName

briefdescription.para: Index the spec fields by name.
Index the spec fields by (source_id, transform) pair.
API for partition spec evolution.

detaileddescription.para: When committing, these changes will be applied to the current table metadata. Commit conflicts will not be resolved and will result in a CommitFailed error.
